website_summaries.verdict: Perhaps not the best choice for off-road cycling, but the Network hybrid model is great for commuting. We'd recommend it to more experience cyclists who are comfortable with tuning and repair work on the fly.
pros: 21 total speeds to choose from, exceptionally good ride
Includes a useful multi-tool for common repairs and adjustments

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Easy to assemble. Shifts easily -- the derailleurs and EZ quick fire shifters came pre-adjusted -- didn't need to adjust them. Rides nice and smooth. Aluminum frame -- not heavy at all. Almost as good as my Diamondback Insight bike, but at 1/3 of the price. Great price that I purchased two for my boys. The only small downside is that one of the bikes needed wheel balancing or truing. Other than that, it's a great bike and I can recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C

customer_reviews.title: This one was perfect. The seat is definitely comfortable and the bike ...
customer_reviews.text: Its been a long time since I have ridden a bike! This one was perfect. The seat is definitely comfortable and the bike handles nicely on the road and also beach trails. It feels very solid but not heavy at all. I am 5'2'' so I was a little afraid it would be too tall but with the seat on the lowest setting its just right. This bike was also fairly easy to put together. My husband and I pieced it together in less than 30 minutes with very little cursing ;) Make sure you have all your tools at hand first! I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Seat Straight From Box? Unridable
customer_reviews.text: Horrible Assembly, took about an hour of extra adjusting of the brakes and pedals so they would work properly and stay in place. As well as the seat didn’t come with anything to hold it to to the actual frame so the seat spins around on the bike. Is unroadworthy and unridable for those reasons. Expecting a refund or a new seat as it came like that.
customer_reviews.author: marcela correa

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my very tall (5 feet 2 inch) 10 year old daughter. Very easy to assemble though instructions werent perfect for raising handlebars (Ive assembked a few bikes) Bike is very well built and sturdy. Tires are ideal hybrid tread. Overall very happy with traditional Schwinn quality. I wouldnt hesitate buying this again and happy we took the big risk of ordering a bike online.
customer_reviews.author: Jack J Springer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BIKE and UNDERPRICED!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bicycle. I am 5'11 and this bike is a nice fit. Although the bike is a hybrid, my body stance on it is best described as that of a cruiser bicycle. The bike is very easily assembled although the instructions were not 100% clear (it's a lot easier than IKEA furniture, haha). The bike is sturdy and looks very nice (as pictured). I have taken this bike through rocks, slight dirt, and grass. It did NOT disappoint. I am satisfied with my purchase and can expect to have this bike for many years.
customer_reviews.author: MWarciak10

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was pretty straightforward and I didn't really have any issues. When fitting the front tire just be careful to make sure the wheel is straight. This one could use just a little adjustment, but rides fine and is very straight. Adjusting the handlebars to fit my girlfriend was easy and she finds it very comfortable to ride. Only drawback is the seat, it's pretty uncomfortable. I ordered her the Sunlite Cloud-9 cruiser gel seat  Much better than the original seat. Good bike for someone wanting to cruise around the neighborhood and even get a decent workout.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Brown

customer_reviews.title: works pretty well for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ride this bike around my campus every day. It's been 4 months so far and it hasn't given me any issue, works pretty well for the price. Well actually, I had to replace the stem due to a bolt consistently coming loose. This may not occur for every bike, but I was able to fix this issue by taking off the stem (bar that connects the handlebars to the front fork tube) and replacing it with one I had lying around. Other than that, everything on the bike is holding up well for the beating I put it through. Make sure you correctly assemble and tune the brakes & gearshifts correctly, and this bike will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great commuter.
customer_reviews.text: This bike is perfect for commuting, I wouldn't really off road or enter a road race, but it handles my 3 miles on crappy Hawaii roads and sidewalks like a champ. It shipped very quickly, especially considering the distance, and other than attaching the handlebars, seat, and front tire, the only mechanical stuff I had to do was pump up the wheels, which was easy cause they used standard valves not those super skinny ones that no one has the nozzle for.
customer_reviews.author: MattR

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble for the most part
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble for the most part, but I took it to my local bike shop to check it over and calibrate the gears. Within a week of riding it- and not strenuous riding either- the rear freewheel broke. I was sent a replacement part for free, but had to take it back to the bike shop- and pay out of pocket- to repair it. Haven't had any further issues yet, but I've never actually had trouble with bike parts breaking before- and I've only ever bought cheap ones from walmart... so I was a little disappointed. Hopefully there aren't any more issues.
customer_reviews.author: stef

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Gals and Guys!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived faster than expected and it is an awesome bike. I bought it so I could ride to work 7 miles and it was perfect. Two others since have purchased this bike for on road of road riding. I bought the mens even though I am a gal, because it was the most versatile for the WHOLE family. I wanted a bike that I could use and my husband and son. The bar is perfect for all of us. Kudos on the top bar placement. This was the ONLY bike that offered that versatility and it also is a great ride!
customer_reviews.author: mcmichael

customer_reviews.title: A Few Drawbacks But Overall Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for me. I am 6' tall and 160 lbs. This is not big bike but for the city it works like a charm. It is easy to put together. When you start using it you will have to inflate the tires once a week. Over time as the rubber stretches they remain inflated. This is not a high-end bike and some of the components feel cheap. The peddles are plastic and the front brake is not well designed. Overall I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. U. R.

customer_reviews.title: Front Shifters = Major gear issues.
customer_reviews.text: The front shifts do not shift well at all. They will rattle like crazy for a solid 15 seconds before they get into gear. Other than that the bike is comfortle and the rear shifters work well
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. A little heavy for carrying up steps. Got a portage strap that works. Converted it to an electric bike. Very easy. Just replace front wheel with same size wheel with built in hub, and attach battery pack. Recharge. i ride the bike locally and it takes on most hills. Wish I had a carbon bike
customer_reviews.author: Gerald I.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike!! The blue with the gray is really pretty, looks so much better in person. My dad put the bike together for me because he is a handy man. He didn't even need to read the instructions. It seemed easy enough and I'm pretty sure I could have done it. I have taken the bike out a handful of times so far and I've had no issues with it. It's a very smooth ride. I would definitely recommend this bike to anyone who is looking for something nice to ride around town with. Great quality for the price! Also a bonus, it arrived super fast!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Esper

customer_reviews.title: What a deal
customer_reviews.text: It was a great deal since I was just getting back into riding
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Bad for Child Carriers or Child Seat attachments - good otherwise
customer_reviews.text: The seat itself has built in suspension, which is why the seat shows raised already. If you're planning to attach a bike carrier or child seat, be prepared to have the seat be raised very high!! This is a good bike if you don't have children.
customer_reviews.author: NCH

customer_reviews.title: Decent price. Mediocre quality
customer_reviews.text: This product was fairly easy to set up. The only annoying thing is that the both tires wouldn't keep air. So I have to get a new tubes, even though the bike is new.
customer_reviews.author: Dex

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride.
customer_reviews.text: It got stolen after the first ride but oh man what a smooth ride. Made it 6 miles round trip without working up a sweat and it had been years since I got on a bike. The seat could be a little softer but there is very little to complain about. It seems someone else thought it was a good bike as well since it got stolen out of my garage the next week.
customer_reviews.author: babyboo

customer_reviews.title: Something wrong with the valve
customer_reviews.text: It will not pump air with our pump. We have 3 other bikes and they all work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Really a nice looking bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike came double boxed with absolutely no sign of damage. The assembly was easy. Weather has prevented me from riding it, yet. However, everything looks perfect. The only thing I had to change was a slight position adjustment to one brake pad. I consider it a beautiful bike. If it rides as well as it looks, it will be a dandy.
customer_reviews.author: John DeVasher

customer_reviews.title: Bad Experience
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and assembled bike to find out that both tire tubes had holes and would not hold air. Also, the back tire rim was not true. Had to go in and spend $85 dollars the day after purchase to fix. Schwinn spends money on shimano parts, but don't seem to spend much money on the tires.
customer_reviews.author: zack peterson

customer_reviews.title: Good bike, I did not have the problems with ...
customer_reviews.text: Good bike, I did not have the problems with the tires as others have posted, I took it to Sports Authority and they calibrated the gearing and inflated the tires. cost about $35.00 but well worth it.I'll have to get a gel seat the poem is a little too firm for my liking,shifts smoothly and recommend the purchase
customer_reviews.author: onadaga

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Its been what I wanted. Haven't had any issues with quality so far really. I thought maybe one of the wheels wobbled slightly, but I'm not sure and it hasn't bothered me. I'm just a casual rider that wanted something to ride a few miles every so often around the city streets mostly.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy bike!!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this bike for over a year and I still love my bike!! It's light weight and easy to put in and take out of my SUV. As far as height goes, I'm 5'4 and I think its a couple inches too big for my height. Its not a big deal and I can deal with that. Personally I would prefer a different seat, but that's just a matter of preference. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Echeverry

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike. Well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike. Well packaged. No damage upon arrival. Very simple assembly. But one of the cheap inner tubes didn't last through an hour of riding. I replaced the rear one (had a BIG hole) already and will probably replace the front with a quality tube, so I don't get stranded some day.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Stobaugh

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bike, i took a chance and purchased a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bike , i took a chance and purchased a used for a cheaper price . It paid off , easy to put together and setup , everything works very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Samlee

customer_reviews.title: My perfect buddy
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bike for me. The assembly was simple and easy. The ride was very fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Tomy

customer_reviews.title: Decent ride, a rather important part fell off.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well for the rider. Would have rated it higher, but cap bolt fell out of bracket that holds handlebar to stem. Have Not yet gotten a reply from Schwinn customer service. Improvised a substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Maley

customer_reviews.title: Fit a 6 foot tall male perfect
customer_reviews.text: So Far so good, I'm 6 foot Tall and it fits Perfect... was easy to assemble .. make sure you have an allen wrench as One was not included with my bike but assembly was pretty easy.. and the gears shift real smooth ..
customer_reviews.author: SourceOneORG

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike, but check for quality assembly and/or damage.
customer_reviews.text: I love the bike. The style, the color, the fit, and the comfort in riding are great! My only issue was that the bike came damaged due to shipping. Also, when taken to a bike shop to get it fixed and adjusted, the mechanic was critical of the quality of the assembly. I highly recommend buyers to take it in to a shop to get it looked over before riding it much.
customer_reviews.author: lebeckm

customer_reviews.title: Working perfectly after about 100 miles. Took about 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Working perfectly after about 100 miles. Took about 4 hours to get completely assembled and tuned up, but not a problem with someone with minor mechanical knowledge. Delivery was exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: RON C

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginner bike.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike. Have already been 100 miles out of which 10 miles on compressed gravel. Easy to assemble out of the box and only took 20 mins. I just had to Watch for videos on tuning breaks. If one brake shoe is too close to rim all you do is tighten the screw about 1/4th and you are good. Bike rolls very nicely and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Retrograde

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike but flat tire after one ride
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike, but had problems like other reviewers with the flat tire. My rear tire went flat after one ride around the block. Yuck, having to change out a rear tire on a brand new bike! Schwinn needs to review their quality control with the tires because it doesn't appear to be an anomaly. Besides that I do like the bike for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Shoper

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but needed repair
customer_reviews.text: I took my bike to a local bike shop when I got it. I could not get the brakes adjusted myself. The bike shop owner showed me that the crank was quite bent. So it cost me an extra $70 to get the bike in shape to ride. But I'm adding miles most every day. I think I'm going to like my investment.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Sjoberg

customer_reviews.title: The stock ones wera super fast.
customer_reviews.text: The bike works well enough, but I would't want to own it if I didn't work in a bike shop where I can fix all the mino things that go wrong. Just be sure to not let it get rained on or you'll be having lots of issues with the bottom bracket after only a few monts. Also, go ahead and put some brake pads in your cart. The stock ones wera super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kathan Bender

customer_reviews.title: Cheap chinese parts
customer_reviews.text: Bike is okay. Cheap chinese tire tubes did not hold air right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Good bike, but don't buy it on-line
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly, and partially assembled as indicated. After hours of trying to get the chain on track, I gave up and brought it to a bike shop. Come to find out the reason I had so much trouble was because the bike's derailleur was broken. It was assembled incorrectly from the manufacturer and both inner tubes had holes in them. Had to buy a new derailleur and two new inner tubes.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.Quentin

customer_reviews.title: Great for someone who really knows bike maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Good bike, but unless you know bicycles as well as a tech would, be prepared to take it in to have gears and brakes tuned properly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P.

customer_reviews.title: The bike is a beauty and arrived in great shape. The only complaint that I have about ...
customer_reviews.text: The bike is a beauty and arrived in great shape. The only complaint that I have about the bike is that it's gear derailer was no where near being sycronized with the shifter. It took a lot of adjusting on my part to get it where it should have been when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian Brommeland

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and lightweight. I carry it up and down my stairs in my 3rd floor apartment. First time bike purchase and I put it together on my own with some help from online videos.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Altic

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price. Delivery was a day early. I need to tune it a little, as the third set of gears don't always kick in as assembled out of the box, but that's strictly an adjustment problem. Everything else was great, and I've had a lot of fun re-learning to ride a bike after about 45 years!
customer_reviews.author: desertrydr

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and didn't take to long to get it ready ...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a bike to ride around my area. This bike did exactly what I wanted. Looks nice and didn't take to long to get it ready to ride. So far no problems. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L Geller

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Great overall bike for leisure and fitness. I changed the handle bar, pedals, and saddle. Now I have a really sound and functional fitness bike that I ride about 4 hours a week! Very comfortable and fits me perfectly! If one is looking for a cool hybrid for fitness with a comfortable ride and not break your bank, then look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Ray

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful bike. It looks in real life exactly like ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bike. It looks in real life exactly like this picture. I am 5'3 and this is the perfect fit for me! So happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Great bike at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great bike at a great price. I went back and bought another for my boyfriend. I did however take it to Dicks Sporting Goods to have them build it (50$) because they true the wheels and fine tuned derailer and brakes.
customer_reviews.author: TIM VANMETER

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: Good bike for the money. It came mostly assembled and adjusted. Just right for an occasional rider. Not a road road bike or mountain bike, it is a hybrid that I ride on park trails.
customer_reviews.author: jehousto

customer_reviews.title: Pedal issues
customer_reviews.text: I returned the product as the pedal did not fit into the slot. The more I tried, I lost the threading and it was a wasted effort to assemble the entire back and then knock it down for returning. I would better buy this assembled from Walmart or try and get it assembled from a professional.
customer_reviews.author: Srinivasan Ramchand

customer_reviews.title: Good bike, lame instructions
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my partner and assembled it myself as a surprise. Its a great bike, however the instructions were next to useless. I tossed them aside and guess my way through building the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Holtz

customer_reviews.title: What a great bike! Was riding an old Murray extreme terrain ...
customer_reviews.text: assembly took about 45 minutes with a screw driver, allen wrench and a 5/8 open end wrench. real simple. took it out this morning and did about 15 miles. What a great bike! Was riding an old Murray extreme terrain mountain bike. World of difference. Quality is great and I didn't have to adjust a thing. Quick fire shifters are really good. Seat is pretty comfortable. This is why schwinn has been in business since 1895. The only thing I added was a holder for a water bottle. Frame is already drilled and tapped and screws are supplied.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hall

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: Owned a couple months. Normally like to wait a year to review things like this, but can always edit. Since driving my piece of garbage the last two years, this schwinn has been a mouthful of gnats fun! It handles a little offroading, but I don't get too fancy not living in mountains anymore. First I thought I'd miss the full on mountain bike, but I don't. Trying to talk wife into swirching to a hybrid. So far thebconstruction is superb for the price point. I've owned some nicer mountain bikes before I moved to the flatland and their quality was on par with this
customer_reviews.author: J. Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for getting around town
customer_reviews.text: Loving this bike! I've used it frequently in a downtown environment and it's been great. Having already put a few hundred miles on it with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: t selea

customer_reviews.title: have had it for 10 months very happy with the bike
customer_reviews.text: have had it for 10 months very happy with the bike. have to say i did put ape hangers on it and could not be happier with the ride.
customer_reviews.author: nogras1

customer_reviews.title: Scared to put it together, but surprised on how easy it was.
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to own a Schwinn, this is one of the best/oldest brand names around. Most of the intricate work of putting it together is already done, like bearings, and derailers, brake wiring and backwheel/chain. I just had to bolt in the handlebars, seat, peddles, and front wheel. excellent! was suprised to see brake pads lined up almost perfectly already, amazing, easiest bike i ever put together.
customer_reviews.author: ronaldkraybill

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good deal!! Easy to assemble even thought it does have a instruction guide and the tools to come along.
customer_reviews.author: Terence

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike, worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Had to put seat all the way down to be able to sit properly and I'm 6ft. But it's a very smooth ride, I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: WhiskeyHelps

customer_reviews.title: great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations.easy to assemble..rides great..prefect for neighborhood trails and roads
customer_reviews.author: michael thingstad

customer_reviews.title: This was a great bike until it got stolen
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike until it got stolen. I am still disappointed about it and it got stolen over a year ago. I have a Jamis Cruiser which costs a lot more, I still miss this bike. This bike is very comfortable with the springs and shocks that I miss. It is also faster than the cruiser I have now. The gears are somewhat overkill in my opinion and can be cumbersome but not impossible. I'm 5'7" and this bike is almost too tall for me. I would make sure you measure, because I had it on the lowest setting possible and I still had to tiptoe on it. Assembly required which takes time and reading but not impossible.
customer_reviews.author: TheCTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Assemble and ride in 20 mins
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. All you need to assemble are handle bar, seat, pedals and front wheel. Front wheel comes with easy latch. You need an air pump to inflate tires 70-90 psi. Inflate the rear wheel first, inflate the front after its mounted. Ride is smooth, I have been riding for a month daily 5 miles and comfortable. I'm 5'7.
customer_reviews.author: karthik sriram

customer_reviews.title: it is a very good buy however
customer_reviews.text: got a flat a week after putting this thing together and riding it. it is a very good buy however. I love this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Young

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike I ride it often and it rides very smooth and the gears shift smoothly
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great bike. It was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. It was easy to assemble. The only thing I really played with was the brakes. It shifts well and rides smooth.The seat is a little hard for my liking so I my change seats in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price. My wife go the Discovery and loves hers as well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sommer

customer_reviews.title: I HEART SCHWINN
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BIKE!!! It gets me around.I commute on bicycle everywhere I go. Starting point is Chula Vista and I work in Old Town and go to school in La Mesa and Downtown!!! Love this bike!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Hemingway

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Easy to assemble bike
customer_reviews.text: Quick Delivery. Good quality. Easy to assemble bike. Thanks for one!
customer_reviews.author: NAS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Well made bike. Easy to put together. Quiet riding on pavement. Gears shift smoothly. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike it is lightweight and very easy to shift gears.
customer_reviews.author: Kip H.

customer_reviews.title: The bicycle arrived in perfect shape I'm enjoying it as the price was right
customer_reviews.text: The bicycle arrived in perfect shape I'm enjoying it as the price was right, when you ordering make sure you have a helmet. Al
customer_reviews.author: Al Morrison

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality, easy to assemble, excellent value. Bike is very lightweight and fun to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great Schwinn Bike, just like the old days!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great bike. Easy to assemble and fun to ride
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: So if you're planning long rides you might want to invest into a better seat, but other than that it's a good ...
customer_reviews.text: bike is as described. Rides smoothly, my only complaint is that the seat is very uncomfortable. So if you're planning long rides you might want to invest into a better seat, but other than that it's a good bike
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, rides great. Best of all, my daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzly Adams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this bike. For $210 you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Rose

customer_reviews.title: It is an easy ride on trails and road
customer_reviews.text: This bike is everything I have been looking for. It is an easy ride on trails and road. The gears are easy to change.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I very much like the sturdiness and color of the Network 2
customer_reviews.text: I very much like the sturdiness and color of the Network 2.0. Easy to handle and smooth riding. Being 5'7", 230 lbs the seat will have to be replaced, because does not have a healthy effect on the tailbone area after about 4 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality so far and the shifting mechanicals are good
customer_reviews.author: Dan Pender

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bike. Looks great in person. My only qualm is that sometimes the gears get stuck if i dont change them too often, but its really not that big of a issue. All in all rides smooth, and is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Praecordia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super Solid, comfortable great all around bike. Fits me perfect (5'4 160lbs) and I love the rack on the back. I took it to a bike shop to be put together. LOVE THE GREEN.
customer_reviews.author: MiraPhoto

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bike.
customer_reviews.text: I commute about 20 miles a day 5 days a week. This bike has hold on pretty nicely for the past 2 months and counting. Pros: -it's light and feels sturdy. -It only need some minor adjustments for it to be ready out-of-the-box. -instructions are helpful for troubleshooting. -I'm 5.8ft and it fits perfectly for my height. -It has rear pin for a rear rack. Cons: -the rear tire popped within 2 days and when I replaced the tube the hole was in the inner side of the tube. -color maybe? I don't like the white because it makes look feminine. ... Nice bike for starters. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Bike
customer_reviews.text: The pedal crank broke after less than 2 weeks of use :-(
customer_reviews.author: Kate H

customer_reviews.title: You will love it. The bicycle is great
customer_reviews.text: You will love it. The bicycle is great. No extra labour to assemble it. I gifted it to my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bike. And it was a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike. And it was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jay K

customer_reviews.title: A bike for people that ride a bike but don't get too serious about it.
customer_reviews.text: I work this bike to death. I'm a bit rough with it on the road and it stays together well. I just recently noticed some odd noises and loose parts but nothing a tune up and oil can fix.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Schwinn 3.0 hybrid bike
customer_reviews.text: This is really a pack good bike. It is easy to ride and shifting is a breeze. Well worth the money I paid for it. My husband add a few extra features for me that is needed when riding, a small fanny a water bottle and holder also a cell phone cell carrier.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: and i love schwinn mens network hybrid bicycle
customer_reviews.text: I have oder the schwinn mens network 3.0 hybrid bicycle.and recvice on 6.4.15.and i love schwinn mens network hybrid bicycle.and iam go to to oder a other noe for my wife schwinn womens network 1.0 hybrid bicycle.in july 1.2015.and thankyou.terry
customer_reviews.author: terry  haddn

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Great i like this bike is perfect for recreation. Needs some work but ok .like the híbrido well Good price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike but shipping damages it easily
customer_reviews.text: Horribly frustrating that it came with a flat tire that I had to take to a bike shop and have fixed. However, Amazon customer service did refund me the cost, plus my inconvenience. I was also missing a nut but was able to find one that fit. The bike rides smooth and is comfortable. I also tow my kids in a bike trailer. It fits easily on the bike and there have been no issues. The bike is great, but shipping a heavy bike does have its problems.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Missing peddles and hardware to hold front wheel on out of box.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great bike. Easy to set up(but no driver included ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. Easy to set up(but no driver included only the one with the star shape). Everything works fine after one month except the back brake. It is squeezing so you need to adjust by yourself. Looks very cool. Price is the most reasonable that I could literally find. The swifter works fine, just my biking skill...
customer_reviews.author: Avalon

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice bike, well made and sturdy, but quite a bit larger than I expected. I would need one in a small size instead of advertised medium. I have a short inseam and the cross bar worries me. Perhaps the sprung forks and seat make it sit too high without a load.
customer_reviews.author: D.Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike came mostly assembled, it took a minute or two to put it together. Smooth riding from the start, awesome bike, great price, perfect for me. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Valencia

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT BIKE FOR THE URBAN RIDER
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike to "get around town". It handles nice and is easy to shift. Great for the novice and the rider looking for a good comfortable ride.
customer_reviews.author: Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Good luck!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good deal for the first few weeks.. The handle bar assembly is defective on mine and I can no longer adjust or remove them. I've been struggling with customer support for a week but it can't ship with handle bars attached. I give up... $200 wasted. Two stars for lasting a little awhile and Amazon attempting to help. So aggravated though!
customer_reviews.author: Haplo

customer_reviews.title: It arrived in excellent condition and was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We bought the bike for our daughter and she loves it. It arrived in excellent condition and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: rear tire tube came busted
customer_reviews.text: Came with a tube that is already busted on the lining which is not flat fixable as it is on the line , wish they do a quality check as it was leaking air on the first time air pump.
customer_reviews.author: Malai

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome bike. easy to assemble (15 min).. plus small adjustments after a initial ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice ride. Not to difficult to assemble. Still trying to figure out whether I can change the handlebar height.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike! Easy to assemble but I didn't realize the tires would come deflated. No worries though, I ordered a pump and it rides like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Whitney

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, and is a good looking machine
customer_reviews.text: This bike is reasonably light weight, sturdy,and is a good looking machine. Additionally it was easily assembled, with only true wheeling and alignment required.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Bike!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy using it for quick rides around the city. Seat will start to hurt if you ride too long. Overall very good
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bike is fine for safe travel from A to B. Front shock needs stiffness. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmet E. Aktan

product_meta.title: Schwinn Network Hybrid Bike, 15-18-inch Frame, Multiple Colors
feature_bullets: Schwinn steel hybrid frame with Schwinn suspension fork offers comfortable and efficient riding
Micro shift 21 speed twist shifters with Shimano rear derailleur for precise gear shifting
Front and rear alloy V brakes stop securely
Soft hybrid seat with springs as well as a suspension seat post for the ultimate comfort
